title: OMG REALLY? leavebuster
body: > Why so f#$&ing you made leavebuster -.- my computer is low but i can play and it sometimes crash and i get leavebuster...{{champion:238}}

replies.body: I'd like to help with this, but could use some more information.  When you say you are crashing, at what point is that happening exactly?  Are you receiving any errors, and what does it say?  Anything could help!

to be completely honest, your technical support has been terrible and i dont think theres anything you could do to help. 

I dont even understand how it is possible that a post like this can get a response from riot, but even after waiting like 2 weeks and opening two different tickets, posting thoughtfully on the boards and on the riot support twitter, I couldnt get any results and had to wait for the 6.15 patch to come out to fix my client crashing.

my post from back then:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/JbtjRk0J-leaverbuster-punishes-players-for-disconnect-bug-in-the-game

Also my tickets that were never resolved, 
the first one: the rep told me to attach files and asked for information that was easily available from those files, even though i attached them in the first message i sent for the ticket. Then he told me he would send my ticket to a specialist and that it would take an unknown amount of time, and he never got back to me. 

A week later i got an email asking "Your ticket has been marked as solved! :D" and a survey asking how i enjoyed my experience...
I opened up another ticket saying that my last one was marked solved but it wasnt and I got an inconsiderate response saying "your ticket is being handled on a different thread #21212121 "... wtf is that. 

So i tweeted about that to riot support and you know what they said? "open up another ticket"    --_______-- u have to be joking.

then i sent a message to riot support saying that if i cant play the game because of this bug, that no one is willing to help me with, then i want my account closed and my money back, because its not fair, with the amount of money ive spent on the game, that i cant play. AND U KNOW WHAT THEY SAID?        nothing, they said absolutely nothing.

I took a look at this for you, and see that your ticket was closed a while back.  There was an issue affecting some players at the time, and a member of the tech team gathered your information to fix things up for you.  If you're still experiencing an issue then there may be something else that's causing it, and we can take another look through a support ticket.  

I'm just now seeing your other post, because to be honest we're pretty new here on the boards and likely weren't around to see it.  To clarify, we're currently helping out on Help & Support boards only.  I understand that your experience hasn't felt too great, but I promise we're here to help as we can.  We don't have a magic wand, and some things just require extra work from both parties to dig deeper and figure out what's going on.  We're happy to assist if you'd like to put in that ticket!
